content: Fidget in true gamer fashion by swapping your spinner for this fidgety controller. It’s modeled after a gaming console controller that comes with seven different and entertaining fidget gadgets designed to keep your hands busy and help you focus.

Start your mornings off on a high note by using this cereal bowl pipe. Its ingenious design combines a glass bong and a functional cereal bowl into a neat package that lets you munch on some tasty cereal while you take huge rips from the built in pipe.

Keep your phone juiced up with help from your favorite electric type Pokemon by plugging it into this Pikachu butt plug phone charger. Just insert the USB directly into Pikachu’s gaping butthole and watch as he uses his powerful thundershock attack to charge.

titleEN: The Wolf Of Wall Street’s Home
content: When it comes to lavish opulent mansions, it doesn’t get much better than the Wolf of Wall Street’s home. Located in Old Brookville, this palatial five room pad sits on 2 acres and features everything from a large gym to a billiards room with walk-in wet bar.

Famed Japanese shoemaker Kyoto Ohata has crafted a pair of pigeon high heels that are designed to serve a very specific purpose – the realistic appearance of the shoes allows Ohata to approach pigeons without scaring them off.

titleEN: Breath Of The Wild Shield Backpack
content: Look like Hyrule’s iconic hero on your way to school by carrying stuff in this Breath of the Wild shield backpack. Modeled after the Traveler’s Shield from the Breath of the Wild game, it offers ample room so you can fit everything from your laptop to your school books.

Give yourself another reason to look forward to your morning roast by preparing this peanut butter and jelly coffee. This unique brew infuses medium roast Arabica coffee grounds with hints of grape jelly and delicious peanut butter to create an unforgettable taste.

Conquer any terrain Mother Nature throws your way while riding atop the Tinger Track ATV. This ultra versatile ride comes with a durable waterproof body and features 20 inch wide tank-like tracks that let it easily travel over shallow water, snow, mud, and dirt.

Add a heavenly touch to your next pool party by keeping an ample supply of liquor at hand by using this rainbow cloud floating bar. It measures over 3 feet long – providing ample space for multiple bottles and comes with four convenient built-in cup holders.

Become the galaxy’s most notorious bounty hunter as you jet down the highway in this Boba Fett motorcycle helmet. It features a fiberglass aerodynamic shell for extreme performance at high speeds and an extra wide lens for enhanced peripheral vision.

This scary movie sound effects machine is the oddly shaped instrument made with the sole intent of producing a wide range of eerie and ominous sounds. It was built by Tony Duggan-Smith for filmmakers who want to opt out of using stock audio.

Forget the red & white wines – all the cool kids these days are drinking some sticky icky green cannabis infused wine! CannaWine combines grapes with non-psychoactive CBD along with 86 other cannabinoids to produce a mellow body high.

Get your furry friend ready for battle by dressing them in this pet samurai armor. Each outfit is customized to fit your pet comfortably so they look and feel great when they are out strutting their stuff for all the other pets on the block.

Make your sci-fi friends green with envy by adding this alluring python skin Death Trooper helmet to your collection. This wearable collectible is covered in a thin layer of genuine python skin and branded with a unique gold emblem.

Tell someone to go eat shit in the nicest way possible with a poop emoji chocolate box. Made by a small-family owned business in New York, they come in boxes of nine perfectly sculpted chocolaty turds that melt in your mouth.

If you’re lucky enough to find yourself in Sydney, Australia, make sure you sink your teeth into a glow in the dark donut. Renowned pastry chef Christopher Thé of Black Star Bakery drenches his creations in a vitamin-B rich glaze that actually glows in the dark.

Ok, admittedly you can’t buy this – but this incredible Mars Rover concept vehicle from NASA is too incredible not to show off. It was unveiled for the  Kennedy Space Center’s “Summer of Mars” exhibit and comes with a detachable lab in the rear.

You might still have a depressingly slow internet connection, but now you can have a blazingly fast place to sleep with the fiber optic bedspread! It emits a captivating light throughout the fabric to give your bedroom a high-tech modern look.

Bring a small piece of your childhood into the 21st century with these cuddly Nickelodeon 90s plushies. These nostalgic plushies are around 6 inches tall and come designed like iconic 90s Nicktoons like Rocco, Arnold, Ren, Stimpy, and Tommy Pickles.

Step into the future of interior decorating with the floating magnetic table. The unique properties of the magnetic table apply classical physics to contemporary design to produce a quality piece as captivating as it is innovative.

Keep your busy hands entertained wizard style by playing around with this golden snitch fidget spinner. This special edition spinner sports a brass frame and two stainless steel wings that’ll have all your muggle friends envious.

Add the 1937 Talbot-Lago T150-C SS Coupe to your automotive collection and you’ll be the envy of every collector and car enthusiast on the planet. Made by the French coachbuilder firm Figoni et Falaschi, it was voted by a panel as the world’s finest automobile.

The Zebra electric wooden boat combines style and efficiency into a sleek and agile vessel that’ll turn heads everywhere you go. It features state-of-the-art onboard technology and can accommodate up to 10 passengers.

If you value your life, the worst case survival kit is a must-have item to have in your doomsday prep stockpile. This TSA-safe kit comes stuffed with dozens of useful tools ranging from a micro saw to a fishing kit and a fire starter.

Looking for the perfect way top off your $600 pre-ripped jeans and $900 distressed sweater? Then look no further than Maison Margiela’s pre-destroyed sneakers. They look like they just got run over by a lawn mower and are a steal at just $1,425.00!

Move over Unicorn Frapps, there’s a new mythical treat in town – the fluffy rainbow unicorn pizza! This Industry Kitchen specialty consists of rainbow dough, topped off with multicolored icing, sprinkles, Pop-rocks, and a big helping of blue or pink cotton candy.

If you’re the patient type and have a few hundred hours to kill, this 5,000 colors jigsaw puzzle is perfect  for you. This daunting puzzle contains exactly 5,000 pieces in 5,000 colors that have been cut into a 5,0000 piece CMYK gamut.

Ruin someone’s day by anonymously sending them a box of crap with this devious elephant shit delivery service. If elephant shit isn’t good enough for your revenge tactics, you can up the ante to gorilla dung – guaranteed to make someone go ape shit with rage.

titleEN: Rear View Motorcycle Helmet Camera Kit
content: Ride with more awareness and freedom than ever before by outfitting your helmet with this rear view camera kit. The kit connects an in-helmet display to an intelligent rear camera that provides a clear wide-angle shot of what’s behind you.

Write memos like a tried and true gamer using this Nintendo Game Boy notebook. This 100-page college ruled notebook is compact enough to take on the go and comes with a Game Boy styled cover complete with a holographic image of the classic Mario game.

Say goodbye to watered down drinks! The liquor freezing system is the indispensable home bar appliance that makes ice cubes out of pure liquor – or mixed cocktails – in mere seconds so that you can give your drinks an extra kick while cooling them down.

The Smartdome enables you to get away from the modern world without forgoing all of its comforts. It boasts a sturdy galvanized steel frame and features a double floor design that lets you run utilities like electricity, water, and whatever else you may need.

Keep your trusted co-pilot by your side during your most dangerous treks by having them ride along in the Ural rugged sidecar motorcycle. It features either single or dual wheel drive while the tough sidecar works great for transporting people and/or gear.

Maximize your backyard’s limited space to the fullest by re-purposing your watering hole using the moving swimming pool floors. When the pool is not in use, the floor slides up to the surface of the pool to transform it into a patio that you can entertain guests on.

Experience an adrenaline rush like no other by hopping aboard the land sailing yacht. This single-person vehicle features a sturdy tricycle base that provides stability as you use the wind-surf-styled sail to propel yourself over the sand.

Even with light pollution in your city you’ll still be able to gaze at the stars with the galaxy wallpaper. Every star cluster, constellation, and planet is displayed in beautiful detail so that you can study and ponder about the meaning of life as you stare at the vast galaxy.

Revive your lifeless phone with nostalgia using this Tamagotchi portable battery charger. Designed to celebrate the 20th anniversary since the Tamagotchi was released, this portable charger features a 2,600 mAh battery capable of charging your phone 1.5 times.

Usher your kitchen into the future by renovating it with this digital animated kitchen backsplash. This interconnected backsplash acts as a giant flowing monitor capable of displaying all types of media – from eye-catching animations to live television.

Capture the moment you and your soulmate decided to spend the rest of your lives together with this hidden camera engagement ring box. The concealed camera will capture your beautiful words and her blissfully stunned reaction so you can treasure it forever.

Reach meat-lover nirvana when you bite into the world’s best bacon, courtesy of the bacon of the month club. Life is too short to clog up your arteries on sub-par pig meat, so reward yourself every month with a hefty package of maple cured bacon.

Have you ever wished upon a star to become a modern day mother of dragons? Well now your wish can come true! The remote controlled jet-powered dragon soars through the air at up to 70 mph and belches propane-powered flames while on the ground.

Don’t let your time of the month bring you down – own your womanhood with a pair of period panties! With colorful characters like “Cunt Dracula”, these bloody awesome panties are a superior option over those granny panties you pull out when aunt Flo drops by.

Feel safer when walking alone by packing this photo taking pepper sprayer in your purse. Apart from dousing your attacker with highly concentrated pepper spray, the integrated camera snaps a photo of the assailant and transmits it to the authorities.

Assimilate your hot and cold food into the perfect environment with this multi-function Star Trek Borg Cube fridge. Taking up very little space, this compact fridge is styled like a green glowing Borg Cube – and works for both hot and cold foods.

Complete work assignments, play video games, or just browse the web like never before with the ultimate computer station that features everything from touch screen controls to air filtering systems – it’ll make you the envy of cubicle dwellers everywhere.

It’s 2017 and the elbow portable cassette player is the new norm for playing aging cassette collections. The minimalist design uses a bi-axial arm that rotates in two directions, allowing you to insert the cassette and switch the playback direction.

Become a total rock star on the road by learning to drive like a pro at the Porsche sport driving school. The school puts you behind the wheel of models like the 911 Carrera S, the Boxster, the Panamera to learn daredevil skills like high speed emergency braking.

Straight outta Dac and into your living room – it’s the Admiral Ackbar singing bass! Made in the likeness of our favorite admiral in the Rebel Alliance, this alien-fish plays the famous melodious cantina song and can also shout his iconic line “it’s a trap!”.

titleEN: Air Force 1 Sneaker Soles iPhone Case
content: Shield your expensive smartphone like a true sneaker head by slipping it into this stylish Air Force 1 sneaker soles iPhone case. It’s made from 100% thermoplastic polyurethane that protects against scratches and is styled to look like the sole of an Air Force 1 sneaker.

Drown your sorrows Simpsons style by placing this inflatable Moe’s Tavern on your property. The outside is designed like a real-live version of the iconic Springfield watering hole loved by the locals like Barney Gumble and Homer Simpson.

Unlock your team’s creative potential by conducting your meetings using the Google Jamboard. This high-tech white board is an internet connected 55″ 4K screen that lets people in different locations view and collaborate simultaneously.

Give your superstitious enemies a good scare by anonymously sending them these mildly evil fortune cookies. They come filled with comical and mildly annoying curses like “may you always step on a wet spot after putting on freshly dried socks”.

Take an interior design cue from Jabba the Hut by bringing this Han Solo carbonite coffee table into your living room. It masterfully depicts the brave Millennium Falcon pilot as he agonizes before being frozen in carbonite and delivered to Jabba the Hut.

Get a heart-pumping cardio workout without punishing your joints by hopping into the Water Walker underwater treadmill. It’s perfect for cardio exercise as well as a method of resistance training – allowing you to strengthen and/or rehab your legs.

Marvel at the beauty of a starry sky from the comfort of your living room couch with this infinity cube.  It features three unique modes including “infinity mode”, “moving galaxy” and “music-reactive galaxy” – and it can be powered by either batteries or a micro USB.

Yarrrrr! Set sail for fun, adventure, and scurvy by having your scallywags hop aboard the pirate ship playhouse. This fine vessel be outfitted with a swing, a slide, and a cool playhouse styled like Blackbeard’s infamous ship – Queen Anne’s Revenge.

The Merge Cube is the world’s first interactive and holographic toy that you can actually hold in the palm of your hand. This iPhone and Android compatible device allows you to use your smartphone to experience augmented reality like never before.

Show your support for the brave men and women that risk their lives everyday by purchasing one of these recycled firefighter bags. Available in either a diaper bag, laptop bag, or backpack design, each bag is made entirely from authentic firefighting uniforms.

Get ready to scratch off another item from your bucket list when you book your stay at the Blue Lagoon Hotel in Iceland. This stunning hotel provides lavish accommodations in addition to a series of man-made pools filled with geothermal mineral water.

Watch your feet transform into cute paws right before your very eyes by slipping them into these animal paw crew socks. These 100% polyester socks feature realistic printing on the front and back and are available in both dog and cat designs.

Keep your perishables fresh while you’re roughing it in the wild by bringing along the Otterbox rugged outdoor cooler. It’s available in sizes ranging from 25 to 65 quarts, features separate interior compartments and can keep ice frozen for up to 2 weeks.

Turn any location into the ideal venue for a live performance by using this mini karaoke microphone. This tiny accessory plugs straight into your phone and comes with an additional jack that lets you listen to the music while you’re singing.

titleEN: Just Wanted To Say High Cards
content: Make your best bud’s day by lifting their spirits – among other things – with this “Just Wanted To Say High” card. Each card is handmade from recycled materials, printed with soy bean ink, and comes equipped with a small built-in holder ideal for including a fat joint.

Draco is the revolutionary high speed FPV racing drone that is actually designed by rocket scientists for maximum performance. It’s equipped with a front camera that places you at the forefront of all the action and can reach speeds up to 100 miles per hour.

Keep your vast collection of shoes from overtaking your closet by organizing them on this revolving shoe rack. The tall vertical design offers twenty-three shelves on which you can store your entire shoe collection using a fraction of closet space.

Give your furry family member the recognition he deserves by immortalizing his likeness with a custom pet portrait. Simply upload your favorite photo of your pet and watch as your canine/feline friend goes from beast to masterpiece.

These incredible sound wave tattoos let you turn up to a minute of your recorded audio into a unique and cool tat that you can actually listen to by scanning it with the accompanying app using your smartphone – provided the tattoo is done by a licensed artist.

After years of settling for beer that only tastes like piss, now you can enjoy the real thing by popping open this beer made from actual recycled urine. This Bear Grylls approved brew features a rich golden yellow hue and  delivers a potent and semi-acidic taste.

Commemorate one of the most daring evasive maneuvers in intergalactic flight history with the Millennium Falcon asteroid coffee table. The base of the table masterfully depicts the scene where Han flies into an asteroid belt to escape the Imperial Fleet.

1.5 seconds. That’s how long it takes the Daymak C5 Blast to go from 0-60 miles per hour. It harnesses the power of a 2,400-Wh lithium-ion battery and the torque of 4 electric motors, making it the world’s fastest consumer go-kart.

Turn your feline into the furriest Time Lord this side of the pond by moving him into this cardboard TARDIS cat house. It’s made from 100% recyclable corrugated cardboard and is styled like a mini TARDIS – complete with windows and the iconic blue “police box” sign.

Help ensure your elaborate proposal catches your future spouse completely off guard by keeping the ring concealed in the slim engagement ring case. Now rather than dealing with a clunky box, you’ll be able to effortlessly hide the ring in almost any pocket.

Ensure your lovely floral arrangement looks fresh for days by placing it inside this life extending flower vase. The vase contains a thermal conductor that helps keep the water cool to prevent algae from forming and causing the flowers to wilt.

Give a gift that keeps on giving by wrapping it in this plantable flower seed wrapping paper. The set comes with four 24″ x 36″ lavender, blue, and ivory colored sheets embedded with seeds that sprout in just a few days of being watered and placed in soil.

Scare the black belt off your opponent when you walk onto the mat wearing the Dragon Ball Z gi. Dressed in the mighty Super Saiyan’s iconic colors, you’ll find the confidence to take on any opponent willing to meet you in the ring – no matter how high their power level is.

Who says only jocks get to wear jerseys? With everything from Harry Potter to Doctor Who to Game Of Thrones, these geeky jerseys allow even the most athletically challenged individuals to represent their favorite TV shows, video games, movies, and more!

Live out your wildest nightmares by spending a few nights at the horror movie survival camp out. You’ll be able to connect with nature while finally settling the debate of which friend in your group would be least likely to survive in a horror flick.

Cut out the middle man by growing some premium medicine from the comfort of home using this cannabis grow system. This compact gadget fits easily in any room and allows you to constantly monitor your plants for premium results.

Convert your favorite captured moments into drawings you can treasure forever by getting them made into a customized coloring book. Each 5 page book is made from high quality paper using the photos that you send in – so that you can bring them to life with color.

Real-life is finally catching up to our favorite Sci-Fi movies with the introduction of the Method-2. This piloted robot suit is a driveable biped robot that stands at an imposing 13 feet tall and weights in at a massive 1.3 tons.

Scare the living daylights out of anyone foolish enough to go near this motion activated Alien egg. It measures 21″ x 36″ and comes with a motion-activated IR sensor that opens up for easy storage, along with embedded LEDs.

Brush up on your astronomy while giving your bedroom some cool ambient lighting by plugging in this star constellations light up cube. This educational lamp comes with the constellations labeled on the top while the sides display them in an expanded format.

Treat your palate to a mouth-watering trip around the globe by sampling the finest chocolates our planet has to offer. Handmade using sustainably grown cocoa, you’ll find pure bliss as you bite into each of the five different and equally delicious chocolate bars.

Set yourself up for dietary failure throughout the year with this monthly cookie delivery subscription. Each month you’ll receive one dozen incredibly delicious gourmet cookies sent right to your doorstep – making this service a no-brainer for anyone with a sweet tooth.

Ponder the great mysteries of the universe when you disconnect from the world and gaze at the galaxy opal. This dazzling opal displays a plethora of vibrant colors and swirls in order to provide an up-close view of the galaxies that lay beyond our reach.

This conductive circuitry wallpaper allows you to bypass a traditional home wiring system to power objects in a more subtle way. Conductive ink lines run across the panels and are linked together using short metal strips.

Blur the lines between the real and the virtual world using this personal holographic system. It comes in 3 different models so that you can use everything from your smartphone to your laptop and TV to project free floating holograms.

Becoming a Pokemon master is hard work – stay fueled up by packing a nutritious meal inside this poke ball lunchbox. It features an integrated handle and push button design that conveniently opens the lunchbox in half.

Why settle for a dinky store bought toy when you can get this massive 1:3 scale Mammuthworks Rewarron R/C car? At over 6 feet in length, this monster car lets you control up to 22 horses in order to execute high performance maneuvers.

Store all your favorite wines like a debonair secret agent with the underground spiral wine cellar. A must-have for serious wine connoisseurs, this space-saving wine cellar is designed to keep every bottle in your collection securely preserved at optimum humidity.

In a sea of infinite tweets, it takes something truly special to stand out. This quirky shop sells a diverse collection of tweets from various celebrities, politicians,  dignitaries, and regular Joes for their outstanding wit or comical relief.

Ensure that the cult you end up devoting your life to leaves you with no regrets the day you follow through with the suicide pact by reading “Which Cult Should I Join?”. It covers 40 of the most high-profile cults  in an immersive choose-you-own-adventure format.

Bring a piece of your favorite sci-fi movie to life by adding this Alien life-size replica head to your collection. The statue perfectly depicts the elongated skull of the horrifying creatures featured in the 1979 classic “Alien”.

Accompany your world class steam with a breath-taking view by stepping inside this panoramic view barrel sauna. It’s made with premium cedar boards, heats up in just 30 minutes, and can accommodate anywhere from 2-8 people depending on the model.

Never be caught without a ruler again while you’re on the job by accenting your outfit with this handy leather watch strap. It comes designed with a fully functional ruler that spans 9-5/8″ (25cm) in length and is laser-cut to perfection.

Add new dimension to any part of your home by placing these perforated cityscape blinds in your living room. They help reduce heat and come adorned with strategically placed holes that create an entire cityscape when sunlight shines through them.

Forget about Unicorn frappuccinos – the latest craze in the bustling coffee industry is black charcoal lattes! Pioneed by the White Mojo coffee house in Australia – the activated charcoal gives the lattes their unique color – but worry not it’s completely safe to ingest!

Stay at the forefront of absurd fashion trends by swapping out your old denim for these clear plastic jeans. These straight leg jeans feature a completely transparent design that’ll keep your legs dry on rainy days, sweaty on warm days – and always stylish!

Share an intimate moment on a cold winter night in the best possible way with the European styled Dutch hot tub. The elegant and simplistic design employs the use of a wood burning heating coil to get this cozy two-seater up to temperatures of a 104 degrees.

Give your sleek smartphone a little old school flair by placing it on this vintage Macintosh iPhone stand. It features a nostalgic design that transforms your phone into a small Macintosh when you slide it into the frame for docking.
